name: monaic
short_description:
(This project only supports Japanese speakers)
N.I.C.H. Monaic is a '2ch' web bbs browser written in GTK+,
and optimized for Japanese ascii arts.

N.I.C.H. is Ni Channel Inchiki Chubou Hackers and founded for
support '2ch' in the Japanese Linux/Unix
